data.title: Trade Tariff: look up commodity codes, duty and VAT rates
data.meta_description: Search for import and export commodity codes and for tax, duty and licences that apply to your goods.
data.text:
Use this service to find a commodity code for goods you’re importing to or exporting from the UK.

You can also use the service to:

check if there’s duty or VAT to pay

find out about suspensions or reductions

You’ll need a commodity code when you fill in a customs declaration form, so you pay the correct amount of tax and duties.

To find a commodity code for your goods, you’ll need details of the product you’re importing or exporting. This could include:

the type of product

what the product is used for

the materials used to make it

how it’s produced

the way it’s packaged

Help with finding the right commodity code

If you’re not sure how to classify your goods, you can:

check the guidance on hard to classify goods

use the A to Z of classified goods to find commodity codes for common products
